Boost Log Library Documentation

Version 1.4

Acknowledgements

First and foremost, I'd like to thank Darryl Green for giving me lots of feedback and showing me other ways to solve things.

I'd also like to thank Caleb Epstein for porting parts of my code to any non-Windows OS (since at the time first version came out, Boost.Thread lib could not be linked statically).

Many thanks to Stefan Slapeta and Bill Wade and a lot of others for giving me early feedback.

I'd also like to thank Pavel Vozelinek for a very thourough review and lots of comments.
